channel.title: Ruse - Timed ban/mute/yell mute command!
channel.description:
Hey,
I want to add a timed ban, mute & yell command to my source (Ruse). I have no idea where to start though.. I found this thread: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/537344-pi-my-time-based-mute-ban-system.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/537344-pi-my-time-based-mute-ban-system.html[/url].
Could anyone help me over Skype/Teamviewer to convert it to fit the Ruse server? That would be awesome.. My skype is: r.sala13
Ofcourse if you don't want everyone to know your skype you could pm it to me or just add me and i'll add you back. Also if you don't want to add me on Skype at all, any help is fine, that also counts for just helping me via this Thread ;)
I honestly have no idea where to start and how to do it, i've tryed finding some existing systems (like the one i gave earlier) but i have absolutely no clue on how to convert it to Ruse..
Please help me :) Thanks in advance

item.title: Ruse - Timed ban/mute/yell mute command!
item.dc:creator: @Soulxs Soulxs
item.description:
@Soulxs wrote:

Hey,

I want to add a timed ban, mute & yell command to my source (Ruse). I have no idea where to start though… I found this thread:
